Subject: Adding elements in Cantera 1.4 MATLAB
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183884267
X-Yahoo-Profile: rkg50b

Hello,

While trying to model reactions of some long-chain hydrocarbons of unknown
composition, I've been encountering difficulty in generating a functional
input file using 'fake' names for the relevant species (I call them
R1, RA,
etc).  These fake species are given the thermodynamic properties of Argon,
just to get started.

Fictitious names for these species often result in gas objects that
have the
mass of real elements, presumably because of name similarity. Essentially,
the fake names do not work.

Is there an easy way to define new elements or species of arbitrary
mass in
Cantera for MATLAB?

Thanks for any help you can provide.

Rohit
